name: Goblin Skulker
description: The Goblin Skulker is a small humanoid characterized by its agility and skill in stealth. It typically wields a shortsword and a shortbow, using its nimble maneuvering to strike from advantageous positions.
memorable: Its ability to deal additional damage when attacking from stealth or in close proximity to allies makes it particularly dangerous in ambush scenarios.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting foes and in group tactics when coordinated with allies.
relations: Often encountered alongside other goblins or in small raiding parties.
environment: Commonly found in forests or caves, often lurking in shadows.
strengths: Proficient in stealth, able to remain unseen and attack with surprising damage boosts.
weaknesses: Vulnerable when isolated, relying on group tactics for effectiveness.
attacks: Attacks with a shortsword for melee encounters and a shortbow for ranged combat, dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Goblin Skulker ability allows it to deal extra damage when attacking from an advantageous position.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, adding a total bonus of +3 to its attempts to remain unseen.
additional_information: Uses Nimble Escape to disengage or hide as a bonus action.
Relies on ambush tactics with other goblins.
Lightly armored but evasive in combat.
test_queries: goblin that strikes from the shadows
goblin that deals extra damage with advantage
